statements: SELECT * FROM safety_stock_levels;
SELECT product_id, safety_stock_level FROM safety_stock_levels ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, safety_stock_level FROM safety_stock_levels WHERE safety_stock_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM safety_stock_levels WHERE last_updated >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, MAX(safety_stock_level) FROM safety_stock_levels GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM safety_stock_levels WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, safety_stock_level, last_updated FROM safety_stock_levels WHERE safety_stock_level > 50 ORDER BY safety_stock_level ASC, last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, safety_stock_level, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updated_date FROM safety_stock_levels WHERE product_id IN (101, 102) AND safety_stock_level < 30;
SELECT MAX(safety_stock_level) AS max_safety_stock FROM safety_stock_levels;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(safety_stock_level) AS avg_safety_stock FROM safety_stock_levels;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM Products WHERE current_stock_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM Products ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, current_stock_level FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level, safety_stock_level FROM Products JOIN SafetyStockLevels ON Products.product_id = SafetyStockLevels.product_id WHERE current_stock_level < safety_stock_level;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' AND current_stock_level > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_category, AVG(current_stock_level) AS avg_stock_level FROM Products GROUP BY product_category HAVING AVG(current_stock_level) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT region_name, location FROM Regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM SafetyStockLevels WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SafetyStockLevels;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT id, region_name, location FROM Regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, safety_stock_level, region_id FROM SafetyStockLevels WHERE safety_stock_level > 100 ORDER BY safety_stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(safety_stock_level) AS total_safety_stock FROM SafetyStockLevels GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' AND product_name LIKE '%iPhone%'
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, category, safety_stock FROM products p JOIN safety_stock_levels s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE safety_stock < 10 ORDER BY category, product_name
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC, location
SELECT p.product_name AS name, s.safety_stock AS stock FROM products p JOIN safety_stock_levels s ON p.product_id = s.product_id ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, safety_stock FROM SafetyStockLevels WHERE safety_stock < quantity ORDER BY safety_stock DESC;
